org.framed.orm.ui.figure

Class ORMRoleGroupFigure

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
      • org.framed.orm.ui.figure.ORMRoleGroupFigure
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.draw2d.IFigure

    public class ORMRoleGroupFigure
extends org.eclipse.draw2d.Figure
    This figure is for RoleGroups. The figure looks in the viewer/editor somewhat like this: --------------------------- | Name | | | | | | | --------------------------- The corners of the rectangle are round and the border lines of the rectangle are dashed.
    Author:
    Kay Bierzynski
